title: Python And: What is Logical And(&&) Operator in Python
content: & in Python(Bitwise) The '&' is a bitwise operator in Python that acts on bits and performs bit by bit operation. x = 19 y = 21 print(x & y) Output 17. The '&' performs a bitwise AND operation on the result of both statements. That is it for and in Python. See also. Python XOR. Python Not In. Python Merge Operator
